scripts.push:dev: echo 'Set GS_BUCKET env var to your bucket' && gsutil cp -a public-read manifest.json config.json dist/viz.js styles.css gs://$GS_BUCKET/cp-gantt/dev/
scripts.push:prod: echo 'Set GS_BUCKET env var to your bucket' && gsutil cp -a public-read manifest.prod.json config.json dist/viz.js styles.css gs://$GS_BUCKET/cp-gantt/prod/
